column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First time in this location...I usually go to the Holzwarth location in Spring. I must say
column2: this location is extremely busy! Lots of young crowd...young adults in their early 20's. If you don't like younger crowds and noises
column3: don't come here. Â Food was great. I got the sprouted ramen
column4: which a recommendation on the menu...wished I could've ordered more mushrooms..oh well
